alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tolland, Hartford and south central Hampden Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 142 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomaston, or 8 miles south of Torrington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Bristol, Manchester, East Hartford, Enfield, Southington, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Agawam, Wethersfield, South Windsor, Farmington, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Berlin and Rocky Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
